children.html:
Nike is lately producing a lot of short videos, which tend to look more artsy and inspirational than traditional ads. 
        These videos co-opt themes such as feminism or inclusivity in order to channel millennial's drive for expression of their
        identity through consumption.

Dream Crazier shines a spotlight on female athletes who have broken barriers, 
        brought people together through their performance and inspired generations of athletes to chase after their dreams.
